description.en:
Mavis, the future first master of Fairy Tail, lives with her best friend Zera on Sirius Island. At six years old, Mavis is just a simple bookworm who dreams of meeting fairies someday. In the year X686, treasure hunters invade Sirius Island, forcing Mavis to take flight and embark on a fantastical adventure! She etches the joys and sorrows of each new encounter and heartbreaking farewell into her memory, and finally figures out her ultimate goal…

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media
description.pl:
Dodatek opowiadający o przygodach założycieli gildii Fairy Tail, w tym o pierwszej mistrzyni, Mavis Vermillion.  
Son Mati - 19 lipca 2015
description.ru: Данная манга является приквелом к "Fairy Tail", и расскажет нам о том как начинала свое существование одна из сильнейших гильдий Фиора - "Хвост Феи".

links.amz: https://www.amazon.co.jp/FAIRY-TAIL-ZERO-講談社コミックス-真島/dp/4063955400/ref=sr_1_1?__mk_ja_JP=カタカナ&crid=1GDL398CTY6XP&dchild=1&keywords=fairy+tail+zero&qid=1605442454&sprefix=Fairy+Tail+Zero%2Cdigital-text%2C359&sr=8-1

biography.en:
Hiro Mashima (真島 ヒロ, Mashima Hiro, born May 3, 1977) is a Japanese manga artist. He gained success with his first serial Rave Master, published in Kodansha's Weekly Shōnen Magazine from 1999 to 2005. His best-selling work, Fairy Tail, published in the same magazine from 2006 to 2017, became one of the best-selling manga series with over 72 million copies in print. Mashima began the currently ongoing Edens Zero in 2018.

Mashima-Sensei is known for many things, but his big three tend to be an art style heavily reminiscent of One Piece, a love for the power of friendship, and a strong work ethic - at one point, he wrote six chapters of Fairy Tail in two weeks, and even now simultaneously balances drawing Edens Zero, doing storyboards for Fairy Tail spin-offs, and playing video games in his spare time.

Mashima-Sensei is known for many things, but his big three tend to be an art style heavily reminiscent of One Piece, a love for the power of friendship, and a strong work ethic - at one point, he wrote six chapters of Fairy Tail in two weeks, and even now simultaneously balances drawing Edens Zero, doing storyboards for Fairy Tail spin-offs, and playing video games in his spare time.
